title: 9' ceilings, Short-Term Lease Available, Linen Closets
posting_body: ['YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', "Conveniently located in Westminster, Colorado, halfway between Denver's central business district and Boulder County and ensconced against breathtaking and idyllic mountain scenery, Westcliff Apartments will not disappoint!", "Featuring one, two and three bedroom apartment homes with stainless steel appliances, upgraded kitchens and the largest square footage in the area, Westcliff is Westminster's premiere apartment community.", 'Call or visit us today!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Gazebo with a Fire Pit & Gas Grill', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Outdoor Spa', 'Linen Closets', 'Game Room', 'Newly Redesigned Kitchens', 'Wine Room', 'Brand New Hardwood Floors', 'Large Walk-in Closets', '5-hole miniature golf course', 'Ceiling Fans in Bedrooms and Living Rooms', 'Short-Term Lease Available', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>']
